an4.96:4.3: Attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an4.96:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya?
an4.96:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā rāgavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ rāgavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:5.3: attanā dosavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ dosavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:5.4: attanā mohavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ mohavinayāya samādapeti.
an4.96:5.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.96:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya?
an4.96:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā na rāgavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraṃ rāgavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:6.3: attanā na dosavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraṃ dosavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:6.4: attanā na mohavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraṃ mohavinayāya samādapeti.
an4.96:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an4.96:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya?
an4.96:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā na rāgavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ rāgavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:7.3: attanā na dosavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ dosavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:7.4: attanā na mohavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, no paraṃ mohavinayāya samādapeti.
an4.96:7.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.96:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca?
an4.96:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā ca rāgavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, parañca rāgavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:8.3: attanā ca dosavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, parañca dosavinayāya samādapeti;
an4.96:8.4: attanā ca mohavinayāya paṭipanno hoti, parañca mohavinayāya samādapeti.
an4.96:8.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
an4.96:8.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
